tooltip.description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.
tooltip.lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.

tooltip.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
tooltip.lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.

tooltip.description: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead.
tooltip.lore: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.

tooltip.description: Blinks an illusion to the target enemy or location, which attacks for a brief time. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges.

Counterspell Ally may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around an allied hero that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead. Any time a spell is reflected by Counterspell or Counterspell Ally, an illusion of Anti-Mage will be created next to the enemy.
For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
tooltip.lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.

items.name: Power Treads
items.active: [h1]Active: Switch Attribute[/h1]Switches between +[b]10[/b] Strength, +[b]10[/b] Agility, or +[b]10[/b] Intelligence.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

items.name: Battle Fury
items.active:
[h1]Active: Chop Tree[/h1] Destroy a target tree.

Cast Range: [b]350[/b]

items.name: Iron Branch
items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

neutral_slot.name: Pig Pole
neutral_slot.active: [h1]Active: Pig, Out![/h1]Turns your hero into a critter for [b]4[/b] seconds and gives them +10% Movement Speed.
